005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.MarkupLine;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
010
011import java.util.Locale;
012
013import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
014
015import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
016import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
017
018/**
019 * A trait indicating that the implementation is a localized definition that is
020 * declared in-line as an instance.
021 *
022 * @param <DEFINITION>
023 *          the associated definition Java type
024 * @param <INSTANCE>
025 *          the associated instance Java type
026 */
027public interface IFeatureDefinitionInstanceInlined<
028    DEFINITION extends IDefinition,
029    INSTANCE extends INamedInstance>
030    extends IDefinition, INamedInstance {
031  @Override
032  default boolean isInline() {
033    // has to be inline
034    return true;
035  }
036
037  @Override
038  default QName getDefinitionQName() {
039    return getReferencedDefinitionQName();
040  }
041
042  @Override
043  default DEFINITION getDefinition() {
044    return ObjectUtils.asType(this);
045  }
046
047  @Override
048  @NonNull
049  default INSTANCE getInlineInstance() {
050    return ObjectUtils.asType(this);
051  }
052
053  @Override
054  default String getEffectiveFormalName() {
055    return getFormalName();
056  }
057
058  @Override
059  default MarkupLine getEffectiveDescription() {
060    return getDescription();
061  }
062
063  @Override
064  default String getEffectiveName() {
065    // don't use use-name
066    return getName();
067  }
068
069  @Override
070  default Integer getEffectiveIndex() {
071    return getIndex();
072  }
073
074  @Override
075  @Nullable
076  default Object getEffectiveDefaultValue() {
077    // This is an inline instance that is both a definition and an instance. Don't
078    // delegate to the definition, since this would be redundant.
079    return getDefaultValue();
080  }
081
082  /**
083   * Generates a "coordinate" string for the provided inline definition instance.
084   *
085   * A coordinate consists of the element's:
086   * <ul>
087   * <li>containing Metaschema module's short name</li>
088   * <li>model type</li>
089   * <li>definition name</li>
090   * <li>hash code</li>
091   * </ul>
092   *
093   * @return the coordinate
094   */
095  @SuppressWarnings("null")
096  @Override
097  default String toCoordinates() {
098    IModule module = getContainingModule();
099    return String.format("%s-inline-definition:%s:%s/%s@%d",
100        getModelType().toString().toLowerCase(Locale.ROOT),
101        module.getShortName(),
102        getContainingDefinition().getName(),
103        getName(),
104        hashCode());
105  }
106}
